header_text: You sent a text to a good friend. A day goes by, and they still have not replied. You think about how your friend doesn't use their phone often, and you feel better.

elements.Text: Is it okay that your friend hasn't responded yet?

elements.name: You sent a text to a good friend. A day goes by, and they still have not replied. You think about how your friend doesn't use their phone often, and you feel better._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
